meanings.definition: Pain in one side of the body.
meanings.sent1: She winced in hemialgia as the pain shot through her left side.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with hemialgia after she complained of persistent pain on her right side.
meanings.sent3: Despite the hemialgia, she managed to finish the race with a determined look on her face.
meanings.sent4: The hemialgia felt like a sharp dagger stabbing at her side with each step.
meanings.sent5: The hemialgia was a relentless companion, never letting her forget its presence.

meanings.sent2: The hemialgia she experienced was a constant reminder of her body's imbalance.
